title: Caffe2 on nvidia turing architecture
body_html:
🐛 Bug

Caffe2 does not work with nvidia turing architecture GPUs. I passed
"-gencode=arch=compute_75,code=sm_75 -gencode=arch=compute_75,code=compute_75"
In -DCUDA_NVCC_FLAGS based on guide: https://docs.nvidia.com/cuda/turing-compatibility-guide/index.html.

It gives me following error:

pytorch/caffe2/utils/GpuDefs.cuh:14:2: error: #error Unknown __CUDA_ARCH__; please define parameters for compute capability
 #error Unknown __CUDA_ARCH__; please define parameters for compute capability
  ^~~~~
CMake Error at caffe2_gpu_generated_top_k.cu.o.Release.cmake:219 (message):
  Error generating
  /home/ubuntu/ppa/pytorch/build/caffe2/CMakeFiles/caffe2_gpu.dir/operators/./caffe2_gpu_generated_top_k.cu.o


caffe2/CMakeFiles/caffe2_gpu.dir/build.make:58309: recipe for target 'caffe2/CMakeFiles/caffe2_gpu.dir/operators/caffe2_gpu_generated_top_k.cu.o' failed
make[2]: *** [caffe2/CMakeFiles/caffe2_gpu.dir/operators/caffe2_gpu_generated_top_k.cu.o] Error 1

To Reproduce

Steps to reproduce the behavior:

mkdir build
cd build
cmake -DCMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX=/usr -DBUILD_SHARED_LIBS=ON -DBUILD_CUSTOM_PROTOBUF=OFF -DCUDA_HOST_COMPILER=/usr/bin/gcc-6 -DCMAKE_CXX_COMPILER=/usr/bin/g++-6 -DCMAKE_C_COMPILER=/usr/bin/gcc-6 -DUSE_SYSTEM_NCCL=ON -DCUDA_NVCC_FLAGS="-gencode;arch=compute_75,code=sm_75;-gencode;arch=compute_75,code=compute_75" ..
make -j

Expected behavior

Code should be compiled and run on nvidia turing architecture gpus

Environment

  • PyTorch Version (e.g., 1.0): 0.4.0
  • OS (e.g., Linux): Linux
  • How you installed PyTorch (conda, pip, source): source
  • Build command you used (if compiling from source): Provided cmake command above
  • Python version: python 3.6
  • CUDA/cuDNN version: cuda 10.0, cudnn 7.3.4
  • GPU models and configuration: NVIDIA Geforce RTX 2080
  • Any other relevant information:

Additional context
